text: wla tubed -ayha alnby- ean mjalstk dueafa' almuslimin aldhyn yaebudun rabihim 'awal alnahar wakhrh, yuridun baemalhm alsalht wajah allh, ma ealayk min hisab hwla' alfuqara' min shy', 'iinama hisabuhum ealaa allh, walays ealayhim shay' min hsabk, fa'iina 'abeadathum fa'iinak takun min almtjawzyn hudud allh, aladhin ydewn alshay' fi ghyr mwdeh
